Class AdminFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facade.AdminFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    facade.CouponClientFacade

    public class AdminFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements facade.CouponClientFacade
    This is the class that director all the manager possibility in this system of the coupon project .

    chaim_chagbi
